item.title: 【Cinema Center】SERIES - Hannah Montana - Complete Season 1 [DVDRemux] (480p) + Bonuses
item.description:
Hannah Montana
Season 1
DVDRemux

English audio & subtitles​

Included all DVD bonuses
In production order

01. Lilly, Do You Want to Know a Secret?
02. It's My Party and I'll Lie if I Want To
03. Miley Get Your Gum
04. Ooo, Ooo, Itchy Woman
05. She's a Supersneak
06. You're So Vain, You Probably Think This Zit is About You
07. Oops! I Meddled Again!
08. I Can't Make You Love Hannah if You Don't
09. Grandmas Don't Let Your Babies Grow Up to Play Favorites
10. It's a Mannequin's World
11. Mascot Love
12. On the Road Again
13. O Say, Can You Remember the Words?
14. New Kid in School
15. Money for Nothing, Guilt for Free*
16. More Than a Zombie to Me
17. Torn Between Two Hannahs
18. Good Golly, Miss Dolly
19. People Who Use People
20. Debt It Be
21. Bad Moose Rising
22. We Are Family, Now Get Me Some Water!
23. Smells Like Teen Sellout
24. My Boyfriend's Jackson and There's Gonna Be Trouble
25. Schooly Bully
26. Torn Between Two Hannahs

* Original ending scene. The alternate ending episode in bonuses.
More info:
The ending scene for the episode "Money For Nothing, Guilt For Free" where Robbie and Jackson have a water drinking contest was removed a couple of months after it originally aired, replaced with a music video of Hannah singing "Who Said". This was due to a woman dying in real life from a water drinking contest to win a Nintendo Wii, with Disney not wanting to potentially endanger kids watching the show by promoting that kind of imitable behavior. This change was kept in all reruns and on Disney Plus, though other streaming services have this scene intact.
